titleStmt.title: Certaine articles concerning the statute lately made for the reliefe of the poor to be executed in London, by the churchwardens and ouerseers of euery parish, according to the effect of the same statute.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [J. Windet for] Iohn Wolfe, printer to the honourable Citie of London,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Articles concerning the statute for the poore.
Identified as STC 9498 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
